definition: Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta

sentences.english: The processing technology of Chinese water chestnut slices was studied in this article.
sentences.chinese: 对热风干燥生产荸荠片的加工工艺进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: The processing technology of microwave puffing water chestnut crisp chip was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对微波膨化荸荠脆片的加工工艺进行了研究。

sentences.english: During storage, fresh-cut CWC was easy to browning.
sentences.chinese: 在贮藏期间，鲜切荸荠比较容易褐变。

sentences.english: Chufa is a kind of garden stuff that can be eaten as medicine or food.
sentences.chinese: 荸荠是一种优良的药食兼用的果蔬类食品。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
water spinach/ong choy/swamp cabbage/water convolvulus/water morning-glory/Ipomoea aquatica (botany)
